mapper.select: SELECT APP_CD , USER_ID , USER_NM , EMAIL FROM MGCB101TM /* MGCB_사용자정보 */ WHERE APP_CD = #{appCd} AND USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT D.ROLE_ID FROM MGCB101TM A /* MGCB_사용자정보 */ , MGCB231TR B /* MGCB_사용자권한그룹매핑 */ , MGCB221TR C /* MGCB_권한그룹설정 */ , MGCB202TM D /* MGCB_권한정보 */ WHERE A.APP_CD = #{appCd} AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.RGRP_ID = C.RGRP_ID AND C.ROLE_ID = D.ROLE_ID
